newsitem.title: USA: VERSATILITY SEES Q1 EPS OF $0.06 A SHARE.
newsitem.headline: VERSATILITY SEES Q1 EPS OF $0.06 A SHARE.

text.p: - Versatility Inc said its first-quarter earnings would come in at about $0.06 a share, slightly below analysts' expectations of $0.07 a share.
The company, which expects to announce actual first quarter results on August 21, posted earnings per share (EPS) of $0.04 in last year's first quarter.
The current quarter's earnings would come on revenues of about $9.0 million, compared to analysts' estimates of between $8.8 million and $8.9 million, the company said.
Versatility had revenues of $5.4 million in the second quarter of last year.
Company officials were not immediately available to comment further.
